name: DigiDNA
tag_list: iphone, ipod, ipad, file-transfer, music-transfer, mac, windows
overview: DigiDNA designs software to transfer, store and manage files, documents and data between Apple mobile devices and computers. The products are developed for both desktop (Mac and Windows) and iOS platforms. The Desktop app DiskAid was the first commercial software that would access the iPhone file system and allow file transfer between devices and Macs or PCs. Many features have been added over time, like the music copy from any Apple mobile device to any iTunes library and the retrieval and export to computer of all iPhone data such as SMS text messages, contacts, voicemail, etc. The latest evolution in file transfer software delivered by DigiDNA is multi threaded, multi devices wireless connectivity. This technology premiere opens up the way to new device management capabilities allowing to push data to teams’ devices over the network without physical access. On the App Store side, DigiDNA has been offering FileApp from the beginnings. FileApp can be connected to DiskAid for file transfer and storage, it offers document reading, PDF editing, and many other features allowing to effectively manage and work with documents, files and folders. Several millions of the “iPhone File System” FileApp have been downloaded in the App Store to date.
